gov.nih.nlm.nls.lvg.Flows

Class ToMapUnicodeToAscii

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nih.nlm.nls.lvg.Flows.Transformation
      • gov.nih.nlm.nls.lvg.Flows.ToMapUnicodeToAscii
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class ToMapUnicodeToAscii
extends Transformation
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    This class converts Unicode characters to ASCII by table mapping. This is a pure table mapping method and is used to normalize unicode to ASCII for characrters can't be nroamlized by other algorithm.

    Users may define their own mapping in $LVG/data/Unicode/unicodeMap.data.

    History:

    Version:
    V-2013
    Author:
    NLM NLS Development Team
    See Also:
    Design Document , Map Unicode characters to ASCII
